2835.verse: يُقَلِّبُ ٱللَّهُ|Allah alternates|123|132|12614$ٱلَّيْلَ|the night|80|97|2742$وَٱلنَّهَارَ‌ۚ|and the day.|105|122|8222$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|87|58$فِى|in|48|65|89$ذَٲلِكَ|that|64|81|28$لَعِبْرَةً|surely is a lesson|133|142|2667$لِّأُوْلِى ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرِ|for those who have vision.|196|196|12615$

2838.verse: وَيَقُولُونَ|And they say,|113|125|3019$ءَامَنَّا|"We believe|97|121|78$بِٱللَّهِ|in Allah|67|91|79$وَبِٱلرَّسُولِ|and in the Messenger|162|186|12620$وَأَطَعْنَا|and we obey."|115|139|2588$ثُمَّ|Then|53|65|293$يَتَوَلَّىٰ|turns away|94|109|2723$فَرِيقٌ|a party|72|102|729$مِّنْهُم|of them|71|101|730$مِّنۢ بَعْدِ|after|91|121|280$ذَٲلِكَ‌ۚ|that.|64|94|28$وَمَآ|And not|72|102|46$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|those|82|97|51$بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|(are) believers.|121|121|4986$

2839.verse: وَإِذَا|And when|85|91|96$دُعُوٓاْ|they are called|119|131|12621$إِلَى|to|53|65|118$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|65|606$وَرَسُولِهِۦ|and His Messenger,|148|160|2497$لِيَحْكُمَ|to judge|76|88|1858$بَيْنَهُمْ|between them,|120|126|1056$إِذَا|behold,|68|125|1370$فَرِيقٌ|a party|72|187|729$مِّنْهُم|of them|71|186|730$مُّعْرِضُونَ|(is) averse.|120|177|789$

2841.verse: أَفِى|Is (there) in|100|108|9535$قُلُوبِهِم|their hearts|97|113|66$مَّرَضٌ|a disease|84|100|90$أَمِ|or|38|54|9003$ٱرْتَابُوٓاْ|do they doubt|114|130|12623$أَمْ|or|38|54|62$يَخَافُونَ|they fear|92|108|4859$أَن|that|48|56|655$يَحِيفَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah will be unjust|143|160|12624$عَلَيْهِمْ|to them|73|106|22$وَرَسُولُهُۥ‌ۚ|and His Messenger?|150|183|5068$بَلْ|Nay,|50|83|848$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|those|82|115|51$هُمُ|[they]|62|78|56$ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ|(are) the wrongdoers.|166|166|2019$

2842.verse: إِنَّمَا|Only|55|65|102$كَانَ|is|57|78|913$قَوْلَ|(the) statement|127|148|3552$ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|(of) the believers|135|156|1964$إِذَا|when|55|76|1370$دُعُوٓاْ|they are called|119|140|12621$إِلَى|to|53|63|118$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|61|606$وَرَسُولِهِۦ|and His Messenger|143|160|2497$لِيَحْكُمَ|to judge|76|93|1858$بَيْنَهُمْ|between them|115|132|1056$أَن|(is) that|75|92|655$يَقُولُواْ|they say,|83|100|4219$سَمِعْنَا|"We hear|80|88|882$وَأَطَعْنَا‌ۚ|and we obey."|115|156|2588$وَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|And those|96|177|55$هُمُ|[they]|62|143|56$ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ|(are) the successful.|159|200|57$

2843.verse: وَمَن|And whoever|106|128|1012$يُطِعِ|obeys|61|106|3789$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|98|1809$وَرَسُولَهُۥ|and His Messenger|143|188|3790$وَيَخْشَ|and fears|85|130|12625$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|75|184$وَيَتَّقْهِ|and (is) conscious of Him,|192|214|12626$فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|then those|92|137|777$هُمُ|[they]|62|107|56$ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ|(are) the successful ones.|195|217|7477$

2835.verse: Allah alternates the night and the day. Indeed in that is a lesson for those who have vision.

2836.verse: Allah has created every [living] creature from water. And of them are those that move on their bellies, and of them are those that walk on two legs, and of them are those that walk on four. Allah creates what He wills. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent.

2837.verse: We have certainly sent down distinct verses. And Allah guides whom He wills to a straight path.

2838.verse: But the hypocrites say, "We have believed in Allah and in the Messenger, and we obey"; then a party of them turns away after that. And those are not believers.

2839.verse: And when they are called to [the words of] Allah and His Messenger to judge between them, at once a party of them turns aside [in refusal].

2840.verse: But if the right is theirs, they come to him in prompt obedience.

2841.verse: Is there disease in their hearts? Or have they doubted? Or do they fear that Allah will be unjust to them, or His Messenger? Rather, it is they who are the wrongdoers.

2842.verse: The only statement of the [true] believers when they are called to Allah and His Messenger to judge between them is that they say, "We hear and we obey." And those are the successful.

2843.verse: And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger and fears Allah and is conscious of Him - it is those who are the attainers.

2844.verse: And they swear by Allah their strongest oaths that if you ordered them, they would go forth [in Allah 's cause]. Say, "Do not swear. [Such] obedience is known. Indeed, Allah is Acquainted with that which you do."
